lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court Friday refused to revive a Louisiana levee board's lawsuit blaming dozens of oil and gas companies for damage to the state's fragile coast, a major victory for energy companies and their political supporters who cast the suit as an attack on a vital state industry.

headline.main: Maine Fishermen Set Lobster Record for Seventh Straight Year
